Reviews.Content: wife stayed hotel changed hesperia doubletree booked agent recommended hotel convenience central close victoria bus station victoria train station underground 5 mins walk gatwick express coach station walking london close pubs eateries nearby launderette concierge staff helpful professional friendly breakfast wait staff particular excellent anticipating food items available request eg porridge meals hotel comment guests mentioned average bar looked unfortunately found air con hot maintaining temperature 25 degrees night unable adjusted ruining sleep quality reported times stay effect windows adequate ventilation nor sheet duvet provided eventually begged duvet cover housekeeping disappeared couple days process finding replacement ironically caused efficient housekeeping staff free internet connection mezzanine floor concierge help found useful apart air con stay issue sorted hotel worth stay
